alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Dawson; Gaines; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 7:41PM CDT until August 29 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ANDREWS...EASTERN GAINES...NORTHWESTERN MARTIN AND WESTERN DAWSON COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near O`Donnell to 9 miles southwest of Welch to 10 miles northwest of Seminole, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Seagraves Mesonet measured a wind gust of 58 mph at 7:23 PM CDT. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lamesa, Seminole, Seagraves, Seagraves Airport, Gaines County Airport, Welch, Loop, Florey, Punkin Center, Patricia, McKenzie Lake, Tenmile, Gaines County Park and Klondike. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
